short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortless Restaurant Reservations at Your Fingertips!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a new extension that enables you to compete with automated bots for popular reservations. With our user-friendly solution, there's no need to learn coding. Secure your desired reservations effortlessly and efficiently.

Make dining out easier with our extension. Currently supporting Resy*, our tool ensures you never miss out on your favorite dining spots. Simply choose your restaurant and preferred time, and let us do the rest!

Key Features:

- Automated Availability Checks: Set your preferred check frequency and weâ€™ll continuously monitor availability for you. No more manual refreshing!
- Instant Email Alerts: Receive immediate notifications once your reservation is successfully booked.
- Unlimited Reservations: Book as many times as you need without any restrictions.
- Database of reservation start times for some of the top restaurants in NYC.

*We are open to expanding support to other reservation platforms based on your feedback.

Make your next dining experience hassle-free with our smart reservation assistant. Download now and never worry about booking again!
